scripts.copy: ncp env/.env.example ../dist/server/.env.example && ncp package.json ../dist/server/package.json && ncp src/web/assets ../dist/server/web/assets --limit=16 && ncp src/web/templates ../dist/server/web/templates
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run clean && npm run ts-build && npm run copy
scripts.watch: cross-env ENV_FILE=env/.env.dev nodemon --delay 3 --watch src -e ts --exec ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register --project tsconfig.json src/index.ts
scripts.test: cross-env ENV_FILE=env/.env.test mocha --bail --file src/index.spec.ts --require ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register src/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.test-file: cross-env ENV_FILE=env/.env.test mocha --bail --file src/index.spec.ts --require ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register
